sources.title: A Dream Walking (1934)
sources.description: Popeye and Bluto each wants to save Olive as she sleepwalks onto a construction site. But most of their efforts go into preventing each other from being the hero. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-dream-walking-1934/

metadata.Plot: Olive goes sleepwalking on the roof of her apartment building. She knocks off a planter, which wakes up Bluto and Popeye, in adjacent rooms one floor down. They fight over who will save her, ultimately ending up high atop a construction site.
metadata.Actors: William Costello, Lou Fleischer, William Pennell
